entries.title: Iran Update, June 2, 2024
entries.description: Unspecified US and Israeli officials said that Israel adjusted its military operations in Rafah to avoid crossing the US Joe Biden administration’s red lines. Israel originally planned to deploy two divisions to conduct clearing operations in...

entries.title: Russian Offensive Campaign Assessment, June 2, 2024
entries.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky met with US and Singaporean officials and highlighted the upcoming Global Peace Summit during the International Institute for Strategic Studies' (IISS) Shangri-La Dialogue in Singapore on June 2. Zelensky...

entries.title: Russian Offensive Campaign Assessment, June 1, 2024
entries.description: Russian forces conducted a large-scale drone and missile strike mainly targeting Ukrainian energy infrastructure on the night of May 31 to June 1.

entries.title: Iran Update, June 1, 2024
entries.description: The IDF Air Force has killed three Hamas officials in the central Gaza Strip over the past week. Israeli forces continued clearing operations in Rafah.

entries.title: China-Taiwan Weekly Update, May 30, 2024
entries.description: Taiwan’s Legislative Yuan (LY) passed legislative reforms to strengthen the legislature’s oversight powers over the government.

entries.title: Iran Update, May 31, 2024
entries.description: US President Joe Biden urged Hamas to agree to the latest Israeli ceasefire and hostage-release proposal on May 31.

entries.title: Russian Offensive Campaign Assessment, May 31, 2024
entries.description: US and German officials confirmed that the United States and Germany have changed their policies to allow Ukraine to use US- and German-provided weapons to strike Russian territory with some restrictions but did not offer precise details about...

entries.title: Africa File, May 31, 2024: Russian Red Sea Logistics Center in Sudan
entries.description: Russia is planning to build a logistical support center on Sudan’s Red Sea coast, which it likely intends to use to advance its efforts to secure a Russian naval base in Sudan. Russia’s backing of the SAF aligns Iranian and Russian policies and...

entries.title: Iran Update, May 30, 2024
entries.description: Israel withdrew some IDF units from Jabalia in the northern Gaza Strip on May 30, according to local Palestinian sources. The partial Israeli withdrawal from Jabalia follows some of the most intense fighting between Israeli forces and Palestinian...

entries.title: Russian Offensive Campaign Assessment, May 30, 2024
entries.description: US President Joe Biden reportedly approved a policy change that will permit Ukraine to use US-provided weapons, including GMLRS rockets — but not longer-range ATACMS missiles — to strike within Russian territory near the border with Kharkiv Oblast....
